Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to disclosure related to appointments by the governor and senate
Summary: Requires that the governor, temporary president of the senate and senate minority leader jointly develop a questionnaire to be filled out and completed by any applicant for appointment to an office by the governor by and with the advice and consent of the senate; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง7-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to disclosure related to appointments by the governor and senate
